Top.description: High high up is the top of the vine?

Bottom.description: How high up is the bottom of the vine?

JumpSpeed.description: How far the player is launched when jumping off the peak of the vine?

JumpCheckSpeed.description: How far the player is launched when jumping off the vine at any other time?

FixDirection.description: Is the player launched in a set direction?

TargetObject.description: The object the player is launched to from this vine.

IsRouge.description: Is this vine used by Rouge? Why is this needed?
